contents:
@金恩王: Frankly, I know English better than you do. This is just my observation. Then again it's not about who speak better English. You started this bullshit.
Back to the article, Tibetans have a rare gene that cannot be found on other humans. What this means is that we could identity Tibetans from random samples with just one gene. Nature does not publish junk. If I were you I would admit losing the debate at this point.
